title: Features and frequency of use of electronic health records in primary care across 20 countries: a cross-sectional study
content:
Publication date: August 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 233

Author(s): G. Kerr, N. Kulshreshtha, G. Greenfield, E. Li, T. Beaney, B.W.J. Hayhoe, J. Car, A. Clavería, C. Collins, S.M. Espitia, M.J. Fernandez, G. Gusso, K. Hoedebecke, R.D. Hoffman, G. Irving, G. Jimenez, L. Laranjo, V. Lazić, H. Lingner, E. Memarian
